system.unidentifiedDesc: The flask or vial holds a swirling and mysterious concoction inside.
system.description:
There are four types: Air, Earth, Fire, and Water (equal chances). The user may change into the form of an elemental of the corresponding type and back to normal as often as desired while the effect lasts. Each change of form takes 1 round. In elemental form, the user gains no special immunities, but may use the elemental’s special attacks (see Chapter 14). Note that protection from evil does not prevent the transformation. The user’s armor class and hit points do not change.

The duration is 1 turn only.
